alert.note: Alert for Henry; Newton; Oconee; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 11:50PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockdale, northwestern Oconee, central Henry, Walton and central Newton Counties through 1215 AM EST... At 1150 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Big Haynes Creek Park to Conyers to near Stockbridge, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Monroe, Covington, Stockbridge, Loganville, Social Circle, Oxford, Porterdale, Walnut Grove, Between, Good Hope, Jersey, Lakeview Estates, Georgia International Horse Park, Big Haynes Creek Park, Pannell, Kelleytown, Oak Hill, Magnet and Almon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
